code: import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{selectUserById}from"./usersApiSlice";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const User=_ref=>{let{userId}=_ref;const user=useSelector(state=>selectUserById(state,userId));const navigate=useNavigate();if(user){const handleEdit=()=>navigate("/dash/users/".concat(userId));const userRolesString=user.roles.toString().replaceAll(',',', ');const cellStatus=user.active?'':'table__cell--inactive';return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{className:"table__row user",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"table__cell ".concat(cellStatus),children:user.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"table__cell ".concat(cellStatus),children:userRolesString}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{className:"table__cell ".concat(cellStatus),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"icon-button table__button",onClick:handleEdit})})]});}else return null;};export default User;
